mapper.select: WITH WISH_COUNT AS ( SELECT gacha_id, COUNT(*) AS wish_count FROM GACHA_WISH WHERE gacha_id = #{gachaId} GROUP BY gacha_id ), TRADE_COUNT AS ( SELECT gacha_id, COUNT(*) AS trade_count FROM TRADE_COMPLETE_HISTORY WHERE gacha_id = #{gachaId} GROUP BY gacha_id ) SELECT G.id AS gacha_id , G.status , G.title , G.manufacturer , G.file_id , F.file_url , G.view_count , IFNULL(WC.wish_count, 0) AS wish_count , IFNULL(TC.trade_count, 0) AS trade_count , G.created_at , G.updated_at FROM GACHA G LEFT JOIN IMAGE_FILE F ON F.file_id = G.file_id LEFT JOIN WISH_COUNT WC ON WC.gacha_id = G.id LEFT JOIN TRADE_COUNT TC ON TC.gacha_id = G.id WHERE G.id = #{gachaId}

WITH PICK_COUNT AS ( SELECT gacha_item_id, COUNT(*) AS pick_count FROM GACHA_PICK_HISTORY WHERE gacha_id = #{gachaId} GROUP BY gacha_item_id ) SELECT GI.id AS gacha_item_id , GI.name , IFNULL(PC.pick_count, 0) AS pick_count FROM GACHA_ITEM GI LEFT JOIN PICK_COUNT PC ON PC.gacha_item_id = GI.id WHERE GI.gacha_id = #{gachaId} ORDER BY GI.created_at ASC
SELECT gacha_item_id , COUNT(gacha_item_id) AS count FROM GACHA_PICK_HISTORY WHERE gacha_id = #{gachaId} AND user_id = #{userId} GROUP BY gacha_item_id ORDER BY gacha_item_id ASC
SELECT id AS place_id , address , name , is_default FROM USER_PLACE WHERE user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY is_default = 'Y' DESC, created_at ASC
mapper.update: UPDATE GACHA SET view_count = view_count + 1 WHERE id = #{gachaId}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM GACHA_WISH WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND gacha_id = #{gachaId}
